name: oui-icons
description: Icons for the Optimizely application and other OUI projects.

scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: rsync -rv --delete ./dist/ ubuntu@design.optimizely.com:/var/www/oui-icons/$(npm view oui-icons version) && ssh -t ubuntu@design.optimizely.com "rm -f /var/www/design-dot/oui/core/icons && ln -s /var/www/oui-icons /var/www/design-dot/oui/core/icons"

author: Tom Genoni <tom@atomeye.com>
